mcq.statement: Who built the Hazuri Bagh Baradari and for what occasion?

options.c: Maharaja Ranjit Singh, after capturing Koh-i-Noor
options.d: Shuja Shah Durrani, for religious purposes

mcq.one_liner: The Hazuri Bagh Baradari was built by **Maharaja Ranjit Singh** to celebrate his capture of the Koh-i-Noor diamond from Shuja Shah Durrani.
